generate.description: If ye lose this, ye be a silly goose and will be posted on the wall of shame‚Ñ¢Ô∏è
generate.title: Yer Passphrase

login.description: Arr, ye be askin' for the key to me top-secret lair, also known as The Fortress of Wordsmithery, accessed only by recitin' the sacred incantation of the 12-word passphrase!
login.title: Hoist the Jolly Roger

information.header: Enter a moniker for yer ship and choose a pirate icon and colors, arrr!
information.title: Pirate Account information

verify.description: If ye already lost it, how will ye ever be able to take care of a wee buccaneer?
verify.title: Enter yer passphrase

legal.disclaimerText: movie-web does not host any files, it merely links to 3rd party services. Legal issues should be taken up with the file hosts and providers. movie-web be not responsible for any media files shown by the video providers.

footer.tagline: Watch yer favorite shows and movies with this open source streaming ship.

search.allResults: That's all we have, me heartie!
search.failed: Failed to find media, try again!
search.placeholder: What do ye want to watch?

notFound.message: We looked everywhere: under the bins, in the closet, behind the proxy but ultimately couldn't find the treasure map ye be lookin' for.
notFound.title: Couldn't find that treasure map

downloads.disclaimer: Downloads be taken directly from the provider. movie-web does not have control over how the downloads be provided.
downloads.hlsExplanation: Insert explanation for why ye can't download HLS here

onAndroid.1: To download on Android, <bold>tap and hold</bold> on the film, then select <bold>save</bold>.
onAndroid.title: Downloadin' on Android

onIos.1: To download on iOS, click <bold><ios_share /></bold>, then <bold>Save to Files <ios_files /></bold>. All that's left to do now be to pick a nice and cozy chest for yer film!
onIos.title: Downloadin' on iOS

onPc.1: On PC, right click the film and select <bold>Save film as</bold>
onPc.title: Downloadin' on PC

downloads.title: Buried Treasure

episodes.emptyState: There be no episodes in this season, check back later!

quality.hint: Ye can try <0>switchin' source</0> to get different quality options.
quality.iosNoQuality: Due to Apple-defined limitations, quality selection be not available on iOS for this source. Ye can try <0>switchin' to another source</0> to get different quality options.
quality.title: Quality

failed.text: We were unable to find any videos for this source. Don't come bitchin' to us about it, just try another source.
failed.title: Failed to scrape

noEmbeds.text: We were unable to find any embeds for this source, please try another.
noEmbeds.title: No embeds found

noStream.text: This source has no streams for this film or show.
noStream.title: No stream

failed.text: Oh, me apologies, sweetie! The itty-bitty movie-web did its utmost bestest, but alas, no wucky videos to be spotted anywhere (¬¥‚äôœâ‚äô`) Please don't be angwy, wittle movie-web ish twying so hard. Can ye find it in yer heart to forgive? UwU üíñ
failed.title: Failed to load meta data

notFound.text: We couldn't find the media ye requested. Either it's been removed or ye tampered with the URL.
notFound.title: Couldn't find that media.

errors.errorAborted: The fetchin' of the associated resource was aborted by the user's request.
errors.errorDecode: Despite havin' previously been determined to be usable, an error occurred while tryin' to decode the media resource, resultin' in an error.
errors.errorNetwork: Some kind of network error occurred which prevented the media from bein' successfully fetched, despite havin' previously been available.
errors.errorNotSupported: The associated resource or media provider object has been found to be unsuitable.

loadingUserError.text: Failed to load yer pirate profile
loadingUserError.textWithReset: Failed to load yer pirate profile from yer custom ship, want to reset back to default?

migration.inProgress: Please hold, we be migratin' yer booty. This shouldn't take long.

delete.confirmDescription: Arrr ye sure ye want to abandon yer account? All yer booty will be lost!
delete.text: This action be irreversible. All booty will be deleted and nothin' can be recovered.
delete.title: Abandon Account

register.text: Instantly share yer watch progress between devices and keep 'em synced.
register.title: Sync to the Cloud

captions.previewQuote: I must not fear. Fear be the mind-killer.
captions.title: Captions
